DOC.brief_summary: Systematic medical chart and imaging files review of patients presenting with non-lymphoma, non-thyroid-related orbital inflammation. The review aims at comparing the frequency of MRI infra-orbital nerve enlargement, between patients diagnosed with an IgG4-related ophthalmic disease (IgG4-ROD) and other patients.
DOC.brief_title: Infraorbital Nerve Involvement on Magnetic Resonance Imaging in European Patients With IgG4-related Ophthalmic Disease
DOC.criteria: Patient suffering from acute orbital inflammation Thyroid disease Lymphoma
